description: This file contains navigation setup and UI composables for an Android TV application built with Jetpack Compose. It defines the navigation graph with animated transitions, focus handling for DPAD navigation, and minimal placeholder screens for the Dashboard, Device Detail, and Camera views.

classes.name: TVFocus
classes.description: Helper object for managing focus requests, specifically the first focus requester in TV navigation.

methods.name: rememberFirstItemFocusRequester
methods.description: Creates and remembers a FocusRequester for initial focus in TV UI.

methods.name: dpadFocusable
methods.description: Extension modifier that makes a Composable focusable and intercepts key events to facilitate DPAD navigation.

methods.name: AppNavHost
methods.description: Sets up the navigation host with animated transitions and routes for Home, Device Detail, and Camera screens.

methods.name: HomeScreen
methods.description: Placeholder dashboard screen with buttons navigating to device detail and camera screens, focusing on TV/DPAD navigation.

methods.name: DeviceDetailScreen
methods.description: Displays device ID and a back button; facilitates navigation back to home.

methods.name: CameraScreen
methods.description: Displays camera ID and a back button; facilitates navigation back to home.
